duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly customer service, take and process orders efficiently.
Clean and maintain tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Ability to lift and carry heavy objects, kneel, bend, twist, and reach and grasp objects.
Show up to scheduled shifts on time and work under pressure at a fast pace.
Work together as a team, assisting other Crewmembers to ensure continuity of service.
Comply with company policies and align with company culture of working hard and having fun.
